description.en: The HP Elite 800 G9 Mini Desktop PC delivers enterprise-grade performance in a compact form factor. Powered by a 12th Gen Intel® Core™ i5 processor with 6 cores and 12 threads, it handles complex tasks efficiently. Features include DDR5 RAM, PCIe SSD storage, Intel UHD 770 graphics, and advanced security with HP Wolf Security. Its ultra-small design (17.7 x 17.5 x 3.4 cm) and Wi-Fi 6E/Bluetooth 5.3 ensure seamless connectivity. Ideal for hybrid work environments, it includes 3-year warranty and uses 45% post-consumer recycled plastics.
description.es: El PC de sobremesa HP Elite 800 G9 Mini ofrece rendimiento empresarial en formato compacto. Equipado con un procesador Intel® Core™ i5 de 12.ª generación (6 núcleos, 12 hilos), memoria DDR5, almacenamiento SSD PCIe y gráficos Intel UHD 770. Incluye seguridad avanzada con HP Wolf Security, diseño ultracompacto (17,7 x 17,5 x 3,4 cm) y conectividad Wi-Fi 6E/Bluetooth 5.3. Ideal para entornos híbridos, cuenta con garantía de 3 años y utiliza un 45% de plástico reciclado posconsumo.
